Make TaR

Source: R/blood_feeding.R
make_TaR.Rd

Make a time at risk matrix (TaR) from a time spent matrix and a circadian function

Usage

make_TaR(pars, t = 0)

Arguments

pars

an xds object

t

the time

Value

an xds object
